title: sanmArgam idu
sahitya:
(rAgA:  sindhubhairavi)   
  sanmArgam idu sahattIrE nallOr sAdhanam sheidiDa vaghuttArE


anupallavi

  pan mArgattin sAram bhakti parOpakAram dunmArgam illAda tUya sadA sAram
			(rAg  kApi)


caraNam 1    sattiya dharumattait-tayangAdu tAnguvIr cancalap-pEigaLaik-konjAdu nInguvIr
nitiyap-poruLaiyE nenjil upAsippIr ninmalar sangattai nidanidam nEsippIr
    caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  kharaharapriyA)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G2 R2 S  tuyar tarum Ashaiyai duritamAi nIkkuvIr donda bandha vinaiyait-tuNDu tuNDAkkuvIr
iyalbenrum tiriyAmal illaram pENuvIr iyarkkaiyin ADalai mayakkarak-kANuvIr
    caraNam 3     			(rAgA:  vAcaspati)Aa:S R2 G3 M2 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M2 G3 R2 S  pErukkum pugazhukkum pErAshai koLLAdIr bhEda buddhiyinAlE jAti koNDeLLAdIr
Urukku nalladai uDan sheya maravAdIr uLLattai illai enroru pOdum karavAdIr
    caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  mOhana)Aa:S R2 G3 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P G3 R2 S  ITTiya poruLinai InduNDu vAzhuvIr iruLum varumaiyum EngiDa shUzhuvIr
nATTinilE jnAna oLiyinai vIsuvIr nayamuLLa uNmaiyai bhayaminrip-pEshuvIr
    caraNam 5  		(rAgA:  suraTi)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G3 P M1 R2 S  mAnattai uyirinum mANbenak-kAkkuvIr mAniDattai deiva mandiram AkkuvIr
dInarakSakanai dhyAnattArk-kUDuvIr dEva jIvanam pera tiruvaruL ADuvIr
